languages.text: {n}Атилиус едва слышно выдыхает и замирает так, словно его ударили.{/n} "Простите, Ваша Светлость... немедленно, немедленно прекращаю..." {n}Он неловко сматывает свиток и убирает его.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Атилиус едва слышно выдыхает и замирает так, словно его ударили.{/n} "Простите, Ваше Благородие... немедленно, немедленно прекращаю..." {n}Атилиус неловко сматывает свиток и убирает его.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Атилиус едва слышно выдыхает и замирает так, словно его ударили.{/n} "Простите, Ваша Светлость... немедленно, немедленно прекращаю..." {n}Он неловко сматывает свиток и убирает его.{/n}

{n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

{n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯发出了一声几乎听不到的叹息，僵在了原地，仿佛挨了一拳。{/n}“请原谅我，大人……我立刻停止记录，立刻……”{n}他卷起卷轴，把它收了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯发出了一声几乎听不到的叹息，僵在了原地，仿佛挨了一拳。{/n}“请原谅我，大人……我立刻停止记录，立刻……”{n}他卷起卷轴，把它收了起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Atilius deja escapar un suspiro casi inaudible y se queda inmóvil, como si le hubieras golpeado.{/n} «Disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}... dejaré de grabar de inmediato. De inmediato...». {n}Enrolla el pergamino y lo deja a un lado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius deja escapar un suspiro casi inaudible y se queda inmóvil, como si le hubieras golpeado.{/n} «Disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}... dejaré de grabar de inmediato. De inmediato...». {n}Enrolla el pergamino y lo deja a un lado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アティリウスはかろうじて聞こえるほどのため息をつくと、殴られたかのように凍りつく。{/n}「お許しを、陛下…ただちに記録を停止します。今すぐに…」{n}そう言って巻物を丸めて片付ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アティリウスはかろうじて聞こえるほどのため息をつくと、殴られたかのように凍りつく。{/n}「お許しを、陛下…ただちに記録を停止します。今すぐに…」{n}そう言って巻物を丸めて片付ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Atilius seufzt kaum hörbar und erstarrt wie vom Blitz getroffen.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich breche die Aufnahme sofort ab. Sofort ..." {n}Er rollt die Schriftrolle zusammen und verstaut sie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius seufzt kaum hörbar und erstarrt wie vom Blitz getroffen.{/n} "Vergebt mir, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Ich breche die Aufnahme sofort ab. Sofort ..." {n}Er rollt die Schriftrolle zusammen und verstaut sie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Atilius laisse échapper un soupir à peine audible et se fige comme si on l'avait frappé.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je vais tout de suite interrompre l'enregistrement, comme vous le souhaitez... » {n}Il enroule le parchemin et le range.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius laisse échapper un soupir à peine audible et se fige comme si on l'avait frappé.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Je vais tout de suite interrompre l'enregistrement, comme vous le souhaitez... » {n}Il enroule le parchemin et le range.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Atilius zar zor duyulan bir ah çekiyor ve vurulmuş gibi donup kalıyor.{/n} "Bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kaydı derhâl durduracağım. Derhâl..." {n}Parşömeni yuvarlayıp yerine koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius lets out a barely audible sigh and freezes as if he had been struck.{/n} "Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... I will stop recording immediately. Immediately..." {n}He rolls up the scroll and puts it away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius zar zor duyulan bir ah çekiyor ve vurulmuş gibi donup kalıyor.{/n} "Bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kaydı derhâl durduracağım. Derhâl..." {n}Parşömeni yuvarlayıp yerine koyuyor.{/n}
